snippet: “Insane Coaster Wars” on the Travel Channel pits one twisty thrill machine against another, and, in a kind of “Coaster Idol,” asks viewers to pick the winner.
abstract: Travel Channel show Insane Coaster Wars pits one twisty thrill machine against another, and asks its audience to decide the winner.
lead_paragraph: “Insane Coaster Wars” on the Travel Channel pits one twisty thrill machine against another, and, in a kind of “Coaster Idol,” asks viewers to pick the winner.

headline.seo: ‘Insane Coaster Wars’ Arrives on the Travel Channel
headline.main: Best at Twisting and Terrorizing? Audience Decides
headline.print_headline: Best at Twisting and Terrorizing? Audience Decides
